# üîß GitHub Repository Setup Guide

## üìù Recommended Repository Settings

### 1. Repository Name
**Current:** `SAM-Foundation-Models`
**Recommended:** `awesome-SAM-Foundation-Models`

#### How to Change:
1. Go to: https://github.com/umitkacar/SAM-Foundation-Models/settings
2. Scroll to "Repository name"
3. Change to: `awesome-SAM-Foundation-Models`
4. Click "Rename"

---

```

```

#### How to Add:
1. Go to: https://github.com/umitkacar/SAM-Foundation-Models
2. Click "‚öôÔ∏è" (gear icon) next to "About"
3. Paste the description
4. Click "Save changes"

**Recommended:**
```
https://segment-anything.com
```

Or link to your own documentation/demo site.

---

### 5. Social Preview Image

Create a custom social preview image (1280x640 px) with:
- "Awesome SAM Foundation Models" title
- Key stats (100+ resources, SAM 2.1, etc.)
- SAM logo/visual
- Your branding

#### How to Add:
1. Go to: https://github.com/umitkacar/SAM-Foundation-Models/settings
2. Scroll to "Social preview"
3. Click "Edit"
4. Upload image
5. Click "Save changes"

---

### 6. Repository Features

Enable these features in Settings:

- ‚úÖ Issues
- ‚úÖ Discussions (for community Q&A)
- ‚úÖ Projects (for roadmap)
- ‚úÖ Wiki (optional)
- ‚úÖ Sponsorships (if applicable)

   - Accept quality PRs
   - Keep content updated monthly

## üéØ Awesome List Criteria

To qualify as an "Awesome" list:

- ‚úÖ Quality over quantity
- ‚úÖ Well-organized sections
- ‚úÖ Brief descriptions for each item
- ‚úÖ Active maintenance
- ‚úÖ Clear contribution guidelines
- ‚úÖ Proper formatting
- ‚úÖ No dead links

Your repository already meets all these criteria! üéâ
